extendedInfo.description: Join thousands of people rocking out to their favorite music. Grab this game because it'll make you feel good!Gameplay Powered by YOUR Music!Experience YOUR music collection as never before with this intense music driven arcade shooter. (Note: Music must be on SD card - Google cloud music is not possible at the moment)Blast away to your favorite tracks. Watch your firepower pulse to the energy of the music.â 100% - 'Must own for action gamers' - AppSpyâ 100% - 'Must Have' - Slide To Playâ 90% - 'Feel the beat!' - 148 Appsâ 90% - 'It'll blow up your screen' - Touch Arcadeâ Levels created from YOUR music collection (On SD card)â Simple 1 stick mode for beginnersâ Twin stick mode for the prosGet the full version:â Play to all of your music (On SD card)â Play to internet radio stationsâ Boss Rush, Survival & Chill Out game modesâ Rank up and unlock 23 perksI'd appreciate if you'd report any issues you're having with the game to support@coldbeamgames.com, please include your device make and model.See FAQ for help on detecting music:http://www.coldbeamgames.com/android-music-faq.html

reviews.title: It\'s a twin stick game on touchscreen...
reviews.comment: Yeah, this isn\'t going to work for me. Try adding joystick support. A for effort. At least it looks pretty.
reviews.author: Alain-Christian Seraphin

reviews.title: WOW
reviews.comment: Didn\'t know you could get it on your phone seen it on xbox market. Fun here can\'t wait to try it on big screen!
reviews.author: Richard Rolfe

reviews.title: Good fun
reviews.comment: At first this game can be very challenging, and later it is still challenging. Definitely getting the full version.
reviews.author: kinetic44

reviews.title: Thanks for providing a demo.
reviews.comment: I was quite skeptical when I saw this game on offer being that originally a twin stick shooter. One stick mode exceeded my expectations to not just feel too easy. Twin stick mode at first try feels like a mess due to the sticks position being customizable as you play. This demo was great at showing me how the game was played and showcasing the locked features for the full mode was a nice teasing reminder. I recommend all to give the game a shot and give twin stick mode more than 1 try.
reviews.author: Chris Brooks

reviews.title: Buy The Full Version (ULTRA)
reviews.comment: This game is RAD!! So much fun!! Just like \"Geometry Wars\" without having to buy an xbox =) I would highly recommend downloading the full version, it\'s only $5, well worth it!!
reviews.author: Joshua Hauff

reviews.title: B\'s!
reviews.comment: Switched phones. Now I have to buy the original version again.. Google play should have this info already... BS!

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Got this on xbox then on my phone. Controls are great. Any complaints about joystick are just those who \'dont get it\'.

reviews.title: Freemium at it\'s best
reviews.comment: Though there are ads throughout the entire game, it still forces you to buy the full game. Quite great idea but too much freemium in the free version
